(Program
  (For
    (ExpressionStatement
      (SequenceExpression
        (Assignment
          (Identifier)
          (Float))
        (Call
          (Identifier)
          (Empty))))
    (ExpressionStatement
      (LessThan
        (Identifier)
        (Float)))
    (Update
      (Identifier))
    (
      (ExpressionStatement
        (Call
          (Identifier)
          (Identifier)
          (Empty))))))
